section.title: Introduction
section.para: The NOF has been designed from the outset to be used within an enterprise application architecture. This section describes what you will need to do in order to build the NOF into your own existing enterprise application architecture, or to create a complete ‘green field’ architecture based around the NOF. Whichever approach you are taking, some significant systems integration work is needed. Over time it is our expectation that the amount of this integration work required will significant reduce as more and more open source solutions emerge.
